story: Once upon a time, in Saltpans there was a vigilante whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Tyrell. It was Easter day in Deepwood Motte when Robert Baratheon threatened the  equality of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the invisibility power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Whispering Wood when Tyrion Lannister met Joffrey Baratheon .  From Joffrey Baratheon Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of gravity Control. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Karhold.  Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Gendry. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was sunrise in The Iron Island when  Tyrion Lannister faced Robert Baratheon. Tyrion Lannister used the power of pausing Time , but Robert Baratheon used teleportation. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved castle. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was Christmas in Torrhen's Square,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Saltpans when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Cersei Lannister by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in The Iron Island there was a advisor whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Greyjoy. It was Easter day in Red Keep when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  freedom of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the gravity Control power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Torrhen's Square when Tyrion Lannister met Renly Baratheon .  From Renly Baratheon Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of gravity Control. It was the Middle Of the Night when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Vale of Arryn.  Tyrion Lannister met Shae. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Daario Naharis. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Middle Of the Night in Castle Black when  Tyrion Lannister faced Daenerys Targaryen. Tyrion Lannister used the power of invisibility , but Daenerys Targaryen used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved treasure. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Deepwood Motte,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Torrhen's Square when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Shae by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in The Eyrie there was a murderer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Princess from the House Baratheon. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Dreadfort when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  peace of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the mind Reading power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Torrhen's Square when Cersei Lannister met Margaery Tyrell .  From Margaery Tyrell Cersei Lannister learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was sunrise when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Kings Landing.  Cersei Lannister met Tywin Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Jon Snow. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was sunrise in The Iron Island when  Cersei Lannister faced Daenerys Targaryen. Cersei Lannister used the power of invisibility , but Daenerys Targaryen used night Vision. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved freedom. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was Christmas in Riverlands,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Deepwood Motte when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Tywin Lannister by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, in Karhold there was a official whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Martell. It was the first day of Spring in Seagard when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  castle of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish was scared of the invisibility power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in The Iron Island when Petyr Baelish met Petyr Baelish .  From Petyr Baelish Petyr Baelish learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was the first day of Spring when Petyr Baelish finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Vale of Arryn.  Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Willas Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in Karhold when  Petyr Baelish faced Margaery Tyrell. Petyr Baelish used the power of teleportation , but Margaery Tyrell used mind Reading. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Petyr Baelish finally saved freedom. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Petyr Baelish. It was Easter day in Riverlands,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Petyr Baelish won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in The Eyrie when Petyr Baelish was finally safe, and celebrated with Lysa Arryn by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in Red Keep there was a warrior whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Targaryen. It was the Winter Solstice in Saltpans when Petyr Baelish threatened the  jewel of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the mind Reading power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Raventree Hall when Tyrion Lannister met Eddard Stark .  From Eddard Stark Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of mind Reading. It was the Summer Solstice when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Torrhen's Square.  Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Robert Arryn. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was sunrise in The Whispering Wood when  Tyrion Lannister faced Petyr Baelish. Tyrion Lannister used the power of fire Resistance , but Petyr Baelish used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved castle. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the first day of Spring in The Trident,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Raventree Hall when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Cersei Lannister by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in Castle Black there was a vigilante whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Lannister. It was the Winter Solstice in Raventree Hall when Bran Stark threatened the  House of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the slowing Time power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Riverlands when Jon Snow met Viserys Targaryen .  From Viserys Targaryen Jon Snow learnt the power of mind Reading. It was the Middle Of the Night when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Winterfell.  Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Rickon Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in Raventree Hall when  Jon Snow faced Bran Stark. Jon Snow used the power of gravity Control , but Bran Stark used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved House. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was Christmas in Red Keep,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Crossroads Inn when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Aegon Targaryen by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in The Twins there was a bureaucrat whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a King from the House Targaryen. It was the Summer Solstice in White Harbor when Petyr Baelish threatened the  equality of Robert Baratheon . Robert Baratheon was scared of the erasing Memory power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was Easter day in Raventree Hall when Robert Baratheon met Cersei Lannister .  From Cersei Lannister Robert Baratheon learnt the power of slowing Time. It was Christmas when Robert Baratheon finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Kings Landing.  Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lysa Arryn. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Winter Solstice in Kings Landing when  Robert Baratheon faced Petyr Baelish. Robert Baratheon used the power of mind Reading , but Petyr Baelish used night Vision. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Robert Baratheon finally saved jewel. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Robert Baratheon. It was the Middle Of the Night in Seagard,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Robert Baratheon won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Crossroads Inn when Robert Baratheon was finally safe, and celebrated with Renly Baratheon by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Torrhen's Square there was a soldier whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Princess from the House Greyjoy. It was Christmas in Seagard when Petyr Baelish threatened the  treasure of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the slowing Time power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Winterfell when Cersei Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon .  From Myrcella Baratheon Cersei Lannister learnt the power of teleportation. It was Christmas when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Crossroads Inn.  Cersei Lannister met Tywin Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Robert Arryn. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Christmas in Crossroads Inn when  Cersei Lannister faced Petyr Baelish. Cersei Lannister used the power of gravity Control , but Petyr Baelish used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved peace. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was the first day of Spring in Red Keep,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in The Eyrie when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Tywin Lannister by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Kings Landing there was a murderer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen  from the House Greyjoy. It was Christmas in Saltpans when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  happiness of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the gravity Control power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in Moat Cailin when Margaery Tyrell met Shae .  From Shae Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of night Vision. It was Christmas when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Eyrie.  Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Joanna Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Autumnal Equinox in The Vale of Arryn when  Margaery Tyrell faced Tyrion Lannister. Margaery Tyrell used the power of invisibility , but Tyrion Lannister used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved House. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Dreadfort,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in The Whispering Wood when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Alerie Tyrell by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Castle Black there was a regent whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen  from the House Lannister. It was Christmas in The Twins when Jon Snow threatened the  lifestyle of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the teleportation power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Red Keep when Cersei Lannister met Aerys II Targaryen .  From Aerys II Targaryen Cersei Lannister learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the Middle Of the Night when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Ruby Ford.  Cersei Lannister met Tyrion Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Ygritte. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was sunrise in Bear Island when  Cersei Lannister faced Jon Snow. Cersei Lannister used the power of fire Resistance , but Jon Snow used pausing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved castle. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was the Middle Of the Night in Red Keep,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Riverlands when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Tyrion Lannister by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Saltpans there was a warrior whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Princess from the House Targaryen. It was Easter day in The Vale of Arryn when Jon Snow threatened the  lifestyle of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the pausing Time power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Moat Cailin when Cersei Lannister met Cersei Lannister .  From Cersei Lannister Cersei Lannister learnt the power of invisibility. It was Easter day when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Crossroads Inn.  Cersei Lannister met Joanna Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Rickard Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Karhold when  Cersei Lannister faced Jon Snow. Cersei Lannister used the power of teleportation , but Jon Snow used pausing Time. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved House. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was the Winter Solstice in Seagard,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in Bear Island when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Joanna Lannister by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in The Trident there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Targaryen. It was sunrise in The Twins when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  happiness of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the fire Resistance power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in White Harbor when Bran Stark met Ygritte .  From Ygritte Bran Stark learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the Summer Solstice when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Moat Cailin.  Bran Stark met Robb Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Khal Drogo. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Winter Solstice in Riverlands when  Bran Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen. Bran Stark used the power of fire Resistance , but Daenerys Targaryen used fire Resistance. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved equality. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was sunrise in Oldstones,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Crossroads Inn when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Robb Stark by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in The Iron Island there was a military leader whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Princess from the House Greyjoy. It was the Middle Of the Night in Torrhen's Square when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  equality of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the teleportation power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Seagard when Margaery Tyrell met Stannis Baratheon .  From Stannis Baratheon Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of gravity Control. It was Christmas when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Moat Cailin.  Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lyanna Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in The Twins when  Margaery Tyrell faced Daenerys Targaryen. Margaery Tyrell used the power of pausing Time , but Daenerys Targaryen used night Vision. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved equality. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the first day of Spring in The Eyrie,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Torrhen's Square when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Willas Tyrell by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, in The Trident there was a rebel whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. It was the Winter Solstice in Karhold when Cersei Lannister threatened the  Title of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the invisibility power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in Karhold when Jon Snow met Gendry .  From Gendry Jon Snow learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the Winter Solstice when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to White Harbor.  Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Tyrion Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in Deepwood Motte when  Jon Snow faced Cersei Lannister. Jon Snow used the power of teleportation , but Cersei Lannister used pausing Time. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved jewel. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was Easter day in Castle Black,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in Crossroads Inn when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Aegon Targaryen by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Torrhen's Square there was a revolutionary whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a King from the House Greyjoy. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Karhold when Bran Stark threatened the  Title of Robert Baratheon . Robert Baratheon was scared of the invisibility power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in Castle Black when Robert Baratheon met Bran Stark .  From Bran Stark Robert Baratheon learnt the power of teleportation. It was the Middle Of the Night when Robert Baratheon finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Vale of Arryn.  Robert Baratheon met Stannis Baratheon. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Eddard Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Christmas in Moat Cailin when  Robert Baratheon faced Bran Stark. Robert Baratheon used the power of fire Resistance , but Bran Stark used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Robert Baratheon finally saved freedom. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Robert Baratheon. It was Easter day in Seagard,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Robert Baratheon won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Torrhen's Square when Robert Baratheon was finally safe, and celebrated with Stannis Baratheon by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in White Harbor there was a spy whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Princess from the House Targaryen. It was the Middle Of the Night in Raventree Hall when Robert Baratheon threatened the  peace of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the pausing Time power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Trident when Margaery Tyrell met Hizdahr zo Loraq .  From Hizdahr zo Loraq Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was sunrise when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Dreadfort.  Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Renly Baratheon. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was sunrise in The Whispering Wood when  Margaery Tyrell faced Robert Baratheon. Margaery Tyrell used the power of night Vision , but Robert Baratheon used night Vision. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved jewel. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the first day of Spring in Riverlands,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Karhold when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Joffrey Baratheon by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in Winterfell there was a procurer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Lady from the House Lannister. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Twins when Petyr Baelish threatened the  freedom of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the erasing Memory power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in White Harbor when Cersei Lannister met Steffon Baratheon .  From Steffon Baratheon Cersei Lannister learnt the power of invisibility. It was the Summer Solstice when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Winterfell.  Cersei Lannister met Jaime Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lysa Arryn. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Bear Island when  Cersei Lannister faced Petyr Baelish. Cersei Lannister used the power of slowing Time , but Petyr Baelish used teleportation. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved treasure. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was Easter day in The Eyrie,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in The Iron Island when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Jaime Lannister by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in Bear Island there was a squire whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a King from the House Martell. It was Easter day in The Trident when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  lifestyle of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish was scared of the teleportation power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Moat Cailin when Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn .  From Robert Arryn Petyr Baelish learnt the power of night Vision. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Petyr Baelish finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Saltpans.  Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Aerys II Targaryen. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the first day of Spring in The Trident when  Petyr Baelish faced Daenerys Targaryen. Petyr Baelish used the power of fire Resistance , but Daenerys Targaryen used teleportation. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Petyr Baelish finally saved peace. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Petyr Baelish. It was the Summer Solstice in Riverlands,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Petyr Baelish won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in Riverlands when Petyr Baelish was finally safe, and celebrated with Lysa Arryn by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in Great Sept of Baelor there was a spy whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Princess from the House Baratheon. It was the first day of Spring in Torrhen's Square when Bran Stark threatened the  lifestyle of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the night Vision power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in Red Keep when Margaery Tyrell met Lyarra Stark .  From Lyarra Stark Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of erasing Memory. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Seagard.  Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Catelyn Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Seagard when  Margaery Tyrell faced Bran Stark. Margaery Tyrell used the power of night Vision , but Bran Stark used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved peace. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the Winter Solstice in Crossroads Inn,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in The Dreadfort when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Willas Tyrell by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in The Whispering Wood there was a spy whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Arryn. It was the Summer Solstice in Deepwood Motte when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  equality of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the fire Resistance power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Winterfell when Jon Snow met Rhaenys Targaryen .  From Rhaenys Targaryen Jon Snow learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was Christmas when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Kings Landing.  Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Mace Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Crossroads Inn when  Jon Snow faced Margaery Tyrell. Jon Snow used the power of fire Resistance , but Margaery Tyrell used fire Resistance. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved equality. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was Easter day in White Harbor,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in Saltpans when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Aegon Targaryen by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in White Harbor there was a military leader whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen  from the House Baratheon. It was Christmas in The Twins when Petyr Baelish threatened the  treasure of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the teleportation power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in The Trident when Margaery Tyrell met Rickard Stark .  From Rickard Stark Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the Middle Of the Night when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Eyrie.  Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Robert Arryn. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Easter day in The Dreadfort when  Margaery Tyrell faced Petyr Baelish. Margaery Tyrell used the power of slowing Time , but Petyr Baelish used erasing Memory. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved peace. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the Winter Solstice in Riverlands,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in The Iron Island when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Alerie Tyrell by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in Bear Island there was a rebel whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Targaryen. It was Christmas in The Whispering Wood when Cersei Lannister threatened the  Title of Arya Stark . Arya Stark was scared of the pausing Time power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Karhold when Arya Stark met Edric Storm .  From Edric Storm Arya Stark learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the first day of Spring when Arya Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Moat Cailin.  Arya Stark met Rickon Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Tyrion Lannister. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Easter day in Crossroads Inn when  Arya Stark faced Cersei Lannister. Arya Stark used the power of teleportation , but Cersei Lannister used teleportation. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Arya Stark finally saved freedom. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Arya Stark. It was the Middle Of the Night in Oldstones,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Castle Black when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Rickon Stark by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in The Iron Island there was a regent whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a King from the House Targaryen. It was the first day of Spring in Great Sept of Baelor when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  freedom of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the pausing Time power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in The Trident when Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister .  From Joanna Lannister Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of slowing Time. It was sunrise when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Deepwood Motte.  Tyrion Lannister met Euron Greyjoy. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Alerie Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Deepwood Motte when  Tyrion Lannister faced Margaery Tyrell. Tyrion Lannister used the power of slowing Time , but Margaery Tyrell used night Vision. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved Title. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was Christmas in The Trident,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Torrhen's Square when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Euron Greyjoy by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in The Iron Island there was a prophet whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Princess from the House Greyjoy. It was the first day of Spring in Bear Island when Jon Snow threatened the  treasure of Arya Stark . Arya Stark was scared of the invisibility power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in The Ruby Ford when Arya Stark met Willas Tyrell .  From Willas Tyrell Arya Stark learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the Middle Of the Night when Arya Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Karhold.  Arya Stark met Robb Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Ygritte. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in Moat Cailin when  Arya Stark faced Jon Snow. Arya Stark used the power of invisibility , but Jon Snow used fire Resistance. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Arya Stark finally saved peace. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Arya Stark. It was Easter day in White Harbor,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Red Keep when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Robb Stark by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, in Red Keep there was a rebel whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Greyjoy. It was Christmas in Karhold when Petyr Baelish threatened the  jewel of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the slowing Time power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Oldstones when Tyrion Lannister met Daario Naharis .  From Daario Naharis Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of gravity Control. It was Christmas when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Saltpans.  Tyrion Lannister met Shae. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lysa Arryn. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was sunrise in Castle Black when  Tyrion Lannister faced Petyr Baelish. Tyrion Lannister used the power of mind Reading , but Petyr Baelish used pausing Time. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved House. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was Easter day in The Iron Island,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in The Trident when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Shae by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, in Saltpans there was a assassin whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a Lord from the House Targaryen. It was Christmas in The Iron Island when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the  freedom of Robert Baratheon . Robert Baratheon was scared of the pausing Time power of Daenerys Targaryen and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in The Ruby Ford when Robert Baratheon met Lyarra Stark .  From Lyarra Stark Robert Baratheon learnt the power of teleportation. It was Christmas when Robert Baratheon finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Deepwood Motte.  Robert Baratheon met Cassana Baratheon. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Khal Drogo. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Summer Solstice in Deepwood Motte when  Robert Baratheon faced Daenerys Targaryen. Robert Baratheon used the power of invisibility , but Daenerys Targaryen used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Robert Baratheon finally saved House. Soon after Daenerys Targaryen was hungry for revenge and chased down Robert Baratheon. It was Christmas in Torrhen's Square,  when our hero met Daenerys Targaryen again, and they fought in the final battle. Robert Baratheon won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in The Twins when Robert Baratheon was finally safe, and celebrated with Cassana Baratheon by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Winterfell there was a assassin whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Martell. It was the Middle Of the Night in Great Sept of Baelor when Arya Stark threatened the  castle of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the invisibility power of Arya Stark and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Oldstones when Tyrion Lannister met Bran Stark .  From Bran Stark Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of night Vision. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Ruby Ford.  Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Rickon Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Winter Solstice in Great Sept of Baelor when  Tyrion Lannister faced Arya Stark. Tyrion Lannister used the power of gravity Control , but Arya Stark used gravity Control. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved happiness. Soon after Arya Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was Christmas in Raventree Hall,  when our hero met Arya Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in The Ruby Ford when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Myrcella Baratheon by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in Red Keep there was a squire whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen  from the House Tully. It was the Middle Of the Night in Seagard when Robert Baratheon threatened the  happiness of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the pausing Time power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Seagard when Cersei Lannister met Aegon Targaryen .  From Aegon Targaryen Cersei Lannister learnt the power of fire Resistance. It was the Winter Solstice when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Iron Island.  Cersei Lannister met Jaime Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Renly Baratheon. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Autumnal Equinox in The Iron Island when  Cersei Lannister faced Robert Baratheon. Cersei Lannister used the power of pausing Time , but Robert Baratheon used mind Reading. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved equality. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was Christmas in Red Keep,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in The Eyrie when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Jaime Lannister by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in Karhold there was a regent whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Greyjoy. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Whispering Wood when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  castle of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the teleportation power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in The Whispering Wood when Bran Stark met Rhaenys Targaryen .  From Rhaenys Targaryen Bran Stark learnt the power of teleportation. It was the Winter Solstice when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Castle Black.  Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Tywin Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Middle Of the Night in Deepwood Motte when  Bran Stark faced Tyrion Lannister. Bran Stark used the power of night Vision , but Tyrion Lannister used mind Reading. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved castle. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the first day of Spring in Deepwood Motte,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the first day of Spring in Oldstones when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Catelyn Stark by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in The Twins there was a rebel whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Tully. It was sunrise in Moat Cailin when Bran Stark threatened the  lifestyle of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the pausing Time power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in Red Keep when Tyrion Lannister met Tommen Baratheon .  From Tommen Baratheon Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of gravity Control. It was sunrise when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Winterfell.  Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Robb Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in Saltpans when  Tyrion Lannister faced Bran Stark. Tyrion Lannister used the power of pausing Time , but Bran Stark used gravity Control. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved lifestyle. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Vale of Arryn,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in Bear Island when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Joanna Lannister by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Great Sept of Baelor there was a vigilante whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Lady from the House Lannister. It was the Winter Solstice in Oldstones when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  lifestyle of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the slowing Time power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Red Keep when Margaery Tyrell met Steffon Baratheon .  From Steffon Baratheon Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to White Harbor.  Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Cersei Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was sunrise in Torrhen's Square when  Margaery Tyrell faced Tyrion Lannister. Margaery Tyrell used the power of fire Resistance , but Tyrion Lannister used fire Resistance. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved equality. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Seagard,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in The Eyrie when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Willas Tyrell by throwing a ball.

story: Once upon a time, in Red Keep there was a bureaucrat whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Greyjoy. It was the Winter Solstice in Saltpans when Jon Snow threatened the  House of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the pausing Time power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Deepwood Motte when Bran Stark met Lyanna Stark .  From Lyanna Stark Bran Stark learnt the power of erasing Memory. It was the first day of Spring when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Bran Stark met Eddard Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Rhaella Targaryen. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Oldstones when  Bran Stark faced Jon Snow. Bran Stark used the power of invisibility , but Jon Snow used gravity Control. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved equality. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the Autumnal Equinox in The Dreadfort,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Torrhen's Square when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Eddard Stark by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in The Dreadfort there was a procurer whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Baratheon. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Saltpans when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  happiness of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the fire Resistance power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in The Twins when Jon Snow met Lyarra Stark .  From Lyarra Stark Jon Snow learnt the power of pausing Time. It was Easter day when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to White Harbor.  Jon Snow met Ygritte. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Alerie Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Karhold when  Jon Snow faced Margaery Tyrell. Jon Snow used the power of erasing Memory , but Margaery Tyrell used gravity Control. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved treasure. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was Christmas in The Whispering Wood,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in Crossroads Inn when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Ygritte by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in Saltpans there was a vigilante whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Arryn. It was Easter day in Moat Cailin when Margaery Tyrell threatened the  treasure of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the night Vision power of Margaery Tyrell and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Red Keep when Jon Snow met Rhaella Targaryen .  From Rhaella Targaryen Jon Snow learnt the power of erasing Memory. It was the Winter Solstice when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Red Keep.  Jon Snow met Benjen Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Loras Tyrell. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Summer Solstice in Raventree Hall when  Jon Snow faced Margaery Tyrell. Jon Snow used the power of pausing Time , but Margaery Tyrell used teleportation. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved lifestyle. Soon after Margaery Tyrell was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was the Summer Solstice in The Vale of Arryn,  when our hero met Margaery Tyrell again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was Easter day in White Harbor when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Benjen Stark by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, in Bear Island there was a procurer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Princess from the House Tyrell. It was the first day of Spring in The Twins when Arya Stark threatened the  Title of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the gravity Control power of Arya Stark and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Torrhen's Square when Cersei Lannister met Catelyn Stark .  From Catelyn Stark Cersei Lannister learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the Summer Solstice when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Bear Island.  Cersei Lannister met Joanna Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Rickon Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Dreadfort when  Cersei Lannister faced Arya Stark. Cersei Lannister used the power of fire Resistance , but Arya Stark used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved jewel. Soon after Arya Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was Easter day in Deepwood Motte,  when our hero met Arya Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Red Keep when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Joanna Lannister by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in Red Keep there was a official whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Tyrell. It was the Summer Solstice in Red Keep when Jon Snow threatened the  House of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister was scared of the erasing Memory power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Castle Black when Tyrion Lannister met Eddard Stark .  From Eddard Stark Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of night Vision. It was the first day of Spring when Tyrion Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to White Harbor.  Tyrion Lannister met Euron Greyjoy. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lyanna Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Easter day in Seagard when  Tyrion Lannister faced Jon Snow. Tyrion Lannister used the power of fire Resistance , but Jon Snow used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Tyrion Lannister finally saved jewel. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Tyrion Lannister. It was Easter day in Seagard,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Tyrion Lannister won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Riverlands when Tyrion Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Euron Greyjoy by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Saltpans there was a procurer whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Arryn. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Seagard when Petyr Baelish threatened the  treasure of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the invisibility power of Petyr Baelish and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in The Dreadfort when Bran Stark met Cassana Baratheon .  From Cassana Baratheon Bran Stark learnt the power of mind Reading. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Moat Cailin.  Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Robert Arryn. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the first day of Spring in Deepwood Motte when  Bran Stark faced Petyr Baelish. Bran Stark used the power of teleportation , but Petyr Baelish used gravity Control. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved treasure. Soon after Petyr Baelish was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was the Summer Solstice in The Whispering Wood,  when our hero met Petyr Baelish again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Seagard when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Catelyn Stark by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in White Harbor there was a hunter whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a King from the House Tyrell. It was the Summer Solstice in Crossroads Inn when Bran Stark threatened the  happiness of Robert Baratheon . Robert Baratheon was scared of the invisibility power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Winterfell when Robert Baratheon met Viserys Targaryen .  From Viserys Targaryen Robert Baratheon learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Robert Baratheon finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Seagard.  Robert Baratheon met Edric Storm. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Sansa Stark. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Middle Of the Night in Castle Black when  Robert Baratheon faced Bran Stark. Robert Baratheon used the power of erasing Memory , but Bran Stark used night Vision. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Robert Baratheon finally saved House. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Robert Baratheon. It was the Summer Solstice in Moat Cailin,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Robert Baratheon won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in The Ruby Ford when Robert Baratheon was finally safe, and celebrated with Edric Storm by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in Oldstones there was a advisor whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Princess from the House Targaryen. It was the Summer Solstice in Oldstones when Cersei Lannister threatened the  Title of Arya Stark . Arya Stark was scared of the gravity Control power of Cersei Lannister and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Oldstones when Arya Stark met Daenerys Targaryen .  From Daenerys Targaryen Arya Stark learnt the power of gravity Control. It was the first day of Spring when Arya Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Red Keep.  Arya Stark met Catelyn Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Joanna Lannister. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was the Winter Solstice in Oldstones when  Arya Stark faced Cersei Lannister. Arya Stark used the power of teleportation , but Cersei Lannister used fire Resistance. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Arya Stark finally saved lifestyle. Soon after Cersei Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Arya Stark. It was sunrise in The Eyrie,  when our hero met Cersei Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Moat Cailin when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Catelyn Stark by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in Great Sept of Baelor there was a revolutionary whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a King from the House Tully. It was the Summer Solstice in The Trident when Jon Snow threatened the  treasure of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish was scared of the erasing Memory power of Jon Snow and refused to fight back. It was Christmas in Riverlands when Petyr Baelish met Petyr Baelish .  From Petyr Baelish Petyr Baelish learnt the power of invisibility. It was the first day of Spring when Petyr Baelish finally gatherered the  courage to travel to White Harbor.  Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Benjen Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Winter Solstice in Karhold when  Petyr Baelish faced Jon Snow. Petyr Baelish used the power of invisibility , but Jon Snow used teleportation. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Petyr Baelish finally saved Title. Soon after Jon Snow was hungry for revenge and chased down Petyr Baelish. It was the Middle Of the Night in Crossroads Inn,  when our hero met Jon Snow again, and they fought in the final battle. Petyr Baelish won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in Kings Landing when Petyr Baelish was finally safe, and celebrated with Lysa Arryn by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in Raventree Hall there was a spy whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Princess from the House Greyjoy. It was Easter day in Torrhen's Square when Bran Stark threatened the  castle of Cersei Lannister . Cersei Lannister was scared of the fire Resistance power of Bran Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Winter Solstice in Bear Island when Cersei Lannister met Rhaegar Targaryen .  From Rhaegar Targaryen Cersei Lannister learnt the power of mind Reading. It was the first day of Spring when Cersei Lannister finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Raventree Hall.  Cersei Lannister met Tywin Lannister. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Catelyn Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the first day of Spring in The Twins when  Cersei Lannister faced Bran Stark. Cersei Lannister used the power of erasing Memory , but Bran Stark used slowing Time. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Cersei Lannister finally saved equality. Soon after Bran Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Cersei Lannister. It was the Summer Solstice in Great Sept of Baelor,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Cersei Lannister won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in Raventree Hall when Cersei Lannister was finally safe, and celebrated with Tywin Lannister by watching a show.

story: Once upon a time, in White Harbor there was a advisor whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a King from the House Tully. It was the first day of Spring in The Twins when Robert Baratheon threatened the  peace of Bran Stark . Bran Stark was scared of the fire Resistance power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in Winterfell when Bran Stark met Sansa Stark .  From Sansa Stark Bran Stark learnt the power of pausing Time. It was the Winter Solstice when Bran Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Seagard.  Bran Stark met Rickon Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Renly Baratheon. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Summer Solstice in The Twins when  Bran Stark faced Robert Baratheon. Bran Stark used the power of mind Reading , but Robert Baratheon used invisibility. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Bran Stark finally saved freedom. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Bran Stark. It was sunrise in Castle Black,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Bran Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in Great Sept of Baelor when Bran Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Rickon Stark by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, in The Dreadfort there was a vigilante whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen  from the House Stark. It was sunrise in Great Sept of Baelor when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  equality of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the invisibility power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was sunrise in Crossroads Inn when Margaery Tyrell met Shae .  From Shae Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of teleportation. It was Christmas when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Eyrie.  Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Euron Greyjoy. It resulted in an epic Victory. It was Easter day in Riverlands when  Margaery Tyrell faced Tyrion Lannister. Margaery Tyrell used the power of invisibility , but Tyrion Lannister used fire Resistance. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved castle. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the first day of Spring in Red Keep,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Autumnal Equinox in Crossroads Inn when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Mace Tyrell by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Moat Cailin there was a procurer whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Queen  from the House Martell. It was the Autumnal Equinox in White Harbor when Robert Baratheon threatened the  peace of Arya Stark . Arya Stark was scared of the pausing Time power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in The Ruby Ford when Arya Stark met Rhaegar Targaryen .  From Rhaegar Targaryen Arya Stark learnt the power of mind Reading. It was Christmas when Arya Stark finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Dreadfort.  Arya Stark met Sansa Stark. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Gendry. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Winter Solstice in Winterfell when  Arya Stark faced Robert Baratheon. Arya Stark used the power of slowing Time , but Robert Baratheon used erasing Memory. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Arya Stark finally saved peace. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Arya Stark. It was sunrise in The Iron Island,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in The Dreadfort when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Sansa Stark by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, in The Iron Island there was a regent whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Lady from the House Tully. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Great Sept of Baelor when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  freedom of Daenerys Targaryen . Daenerys Targaryen was scared of the slowing Time power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was Easter day in Raventree Hall when Daenerys Targaryen met Eddard Stark .  From Eddard Stark Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of invisibility. It was the Summer Solstice when Daenerys Targaryen finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Whispering Wood.  Daenerys Targaryen met Daario Naharis. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Euron Greyjoy. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Vale of Arryn when  Daenerys Targaryen faced Tyrion Lannister. Daenerys Targaryen used the power of slowing Time , but Tyrion Lannister used erasing Memory. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Daenerys Targaryen finally saved peace. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Daenerys Targaryen. It was the Summer Solstice in Crossroads Inn,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Daenerys Targaryen won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in The Eyrie when Daenerys Targaryen was finally safe, and celebrated with Daario Naharis by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, in Red Keep there was a spy whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a King from the House Lannister. It was the Summer Solstice in The Trident when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  lifestyle of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish was scared of the invisibility power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was the first day of Spring in The Eyrie when Petyr Baelish met Benjen Stark .  From Benjen Stark Petyr Baelish learnt the power of slowing Time. It was the Autumnal Equinox when Petyr Baelish finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Torrhen's Square.  Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Lancel Lannister. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Winter Solstice in Karhold when  Petyr Baelish faced Tyrion Lannister. Petyr Baelish used the power of erasing Memory , but Tyrion Lannister used fire Resistance. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Petyr Baelish finally saved treasure. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Petyr Baelish. It was Christmas in Torrhen's Square,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Petyr Baelish won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in Crossroads Inn when Petyr Baelish was finally safe, and celebrated with Robert Arryn by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, in Riverlands there was a official whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Greyjoy. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Great Sept of Baelor when Robert Baratheon threatened the  treasure of Jon Snow . Jon Snow was scared of the erasing Memory power of Robert Baratheon and refused to fight back. It was the Middle Of the Night in Riverlands when Jon Snow met Mace Tyrell .  From Mace Tyrell Jon Snow learnt the power of teleportation. It was sunrise when Jon Snow finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Trident.  Jon Snow met Viserys Targaryen. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Edric Storm. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Winter Solstice in Kings Landing when  Jon Snow faced Robert Baratheon. Jon Snow used the power of pausing Time , but Robert Baratheon used fire Resistance. Our hero was Injured. After a bloody fight, Jon Snow finally saved Title. Soon after Robert Baratheon was hungry for revenge and chased down Jon Snow. It was the Winter Solstice in The Vale of Arryn,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Jon Snow won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was the Middle Of the Night in Seagard when Jon Snow was finally safe, and celebrated with Viserys Targaryen by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, in Oldstones there was a regent whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen  from the House Lannister. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Deepwood Motte when Tyrion Lannister threatened the  House of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell was scared of the gravity Control power of Tyrion Lannister and refused to fight back. It was the Autumnal Equinox in Raventree Hall when Margaery Tyrell met Euron Greyjoy .  From Euron Greyjoy Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of night Vision. It was Easter day when Margaery Tyrell finally gatherered the  courage to travel to Red Keep.  Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Jaime Lannister. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was the Middle Of the Night in Deepwood Motte when  Margaery Tyrell faced Tyrion Lannister. Margaery Tyrell used the power of pausing Time , but Tyrion Lannister used invisibility. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Margaery Tyrell finally saved freedom. Soon after Tyrion Lannister was hungry for revenge and chased down Margaery Tyrell. It was the Middle Of the Night in Kings Landing,  when our hero met Tyrion Lannister again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was Christmas in The Whispering Wood when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Alerie Tyrell by getting married.
